page.title: 16APPLIANCES USED IN CORBY.
page.content:
The Craft department undertook a survey to identify which electrical household appliances were in regular use in 1985. A random sample of families in the study area supplied the following information.
Video 58% Colour T.V. 95% Slide projector 20% Computer 76% Hi-fi system 88% Tape-recorder 85% Cooker 48% Refrigerator 98% Washing machine100% Tumble drier 60% Deep freeze 80% Microwave 16% Sandwich maker 61% Toaster 50% Mixer/Blender 68% Iron 100% Kettle 83% Sewing machine 65% Lawn-mower 78% Hedge cutter 18% Drill 76% Air filter 10% Telephone 78% Hair-drier 86% Alarm system 6% Central heating76% Storage radiators 15%
